ModMetaData.name: Outland x Medieval Overhaul Patch
ModMetaData.author: Joe Daly
ModMetaData.description: This is a patch to remove some redundant buildings and to make Medieval Overhaul and Outland play nice together. Medieval Overhaul bones will be used instead of Outland Bones. There is also support for MO bones to replace Rim of Madness bones if that mod is active.
